channel.title: Exilia
channel.description:
Hello and Welcome to Exilia, this is a very unique and very fun Server, with many suprises. This is a new server out, only been out for about 1day, The server is improving ALOT, so You won’t get bored. The Server is ran On a vps, which will cause no lagg, and barely any downtime.
THERE IS NON OFF THAT 614 SHIT HERE, LIKE MOST SERVERS. -.- The server has been out for about 1 day, and already has about 10 players, that Are on All the time.
Economy, is the most important things of the server, In Exilia there is a REAL economy. Some items are harder to get, Some easier. You can get yourself money either skilling,pking or Killing monsters for good drops. You can also go for the rare drops to the boss monsters that there are. We have also fixed ALL of the dupes in our source, And that makes the gameplay even more enjoyable!
Exilia Staff. Me (power) And nick, choose the Staff very carefully, we Keep a good eye out for people doing good, and helping others, in the exilia Community.
Why you should play Exilia? Well that is easy, You should play Exilia because, it is a fun Pk/skilling Server, like no others. Members of Staff always try their best to help other, (if their not busy). the server is update ALOT so you will not be bored/
Features; - Vps hosted. - 24-7 uptime. - Crystal key system. - Custom MiniGame. - Great Eco. - No Lagg. - Godwars. - 474 GameFrame. - Great Staff.
Update Blog. [code] Fixed Barrows. Fixed Slayer Tower. Staff Now have the correct Crowns. Firecape now moves, in sted of staying Still. Change Home - Bored off edgeville. -.- Can use bones on Alter, with a Option to bury all. [/code]
Future updates.
Future updates: [code] Agility. Fix DKs. Add new weapons (maybe.) Full Screen. Curses (maybe.) Player Clipping. Npc clipping. [/code]
Home. [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/xekj8y.png[/img]
Bone option. [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/168ahpk.png[/img]
Gambling. [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2cndv1t.png[/img]
EP Rewars. [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/286tkpw.png[/img]
Server is now up For beta Testing.
Credits for demise For the base. Credits for insanity. credits for me. And who ever else wants them.

item.description:
@pot_up_pls wrote:

haha yeah man, 2nd page off runelocus also, still needs improvements though, i need to fix the webclient (hopefully not too hard), i want to add more pvp areas, such as lumbridge pvp, with EP and pvp drops. Fixed The Slayer And barrows bug, took me quite long to fix that.

Hello and Welcome to Exilia, this is a very unique and very fun Server, with many suprises.
This is a new server out, only been out for about 1day, The server is improving ALOT, so You won’t get
bored. The Server is ran On a vps, which will cause no lagg, and barely any downtime.

The server has been out for about 1 day, and already has about 10 players, that Are on All the time.

And that makes the gameplay even more enjoyable!
